title: My Blue River
description: Adelaide Davis is a 17 year old Southern California girl about to enter her senior year of high school. She has big plans for her life, until her parents destroy her dreams by announcing they will move to a small town in Montana. Addy believes her life will never be the same, and she's right, but not in a way that she could ever imagine. A handsome young cowboy will turn her world upside down, but there are two problems--nothing will keep her from returning to San Diego and he will never leave Montana.
author: Leslie Trammell
